Detailed Description

Provides a final wrapper on an http response.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) setCookieValue: (NSString*)  value
forKey: (NSString*)  key
expires: (NSDate*)  expireDate
secure: (BOOL)  isSecure
domain: (NSString*)  domain
path: (NSString*)  path 

Provides cookie setting support Multiple cookies can be set for a single response, setting a new cookie overites the old. Also, if a cookie was previously set with an expireation date, users can pass nil for all cookie params to only change the value itself.

See WebRequest -valueForCookie:(NSString*)cookieKey for accessing cookies

Parameters:
expireDate Optional expireation date as used by browsers
isSecure If the cookie should only be sent over a secure connection to the server.
domain The domain for the cookie if different then the request's domain.
path The path for the cookie if different then the requesting path.
